typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRCSME
source(output(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDim
source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(PARTICIPANT_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_PARTICIPANT',
	format: 'query') ~> ExistingDimMaxPartcipantID
Participantcomibanation aggregate(groupBy(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT),
	each(match(name!='UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT'), $$ = last($$))) ~> DistinctParticipants
DistinctParticipants derive(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,
ID,
USERNAME,
EMAIL,
SALUTATION,
FIRST_NAME,
MIDDLE_NAME,
LAST_NAME,
GENDER,
YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
JOB_TITLE,
HOWLONG,
PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
ADDRESS,
CITY_NAME,
POBOX,
POST_CODE,
NATIONALITY,
SKYPE,
AIM,
Yahoo,
MSN,
UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT,
CITY_REGION)) ~> SourceRecordHash
Prticipantcombination aggregate(groupBy(PARTICIPANT_ID,
		UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestParticipantID
SourceRecordHash, ExistingRecordHash exists(SOURCE_RECORD_HASH == RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, ExistingRecordHash lookup(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT == EXIST_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXIST_PARTICIPANT_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecord, UpdateRecord)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecord, ExistingDimMaxPartcipantID join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 keyGenerate(output(Dim_Surrogate_Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(PARTICIPANT_ID = MAX_VAL+Dim_Surrogate_Key,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdateRecord derive(VERSION_NO = EXIST_VERSION_NO+1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo1
RunInfo1 alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow2
SRCSME select(mapColumn(
		ID = id,
		USERNAME = Username,
		EMAIL = Email,
		SALUTATION = Title,
		FIRST_NAME = {First name},
		MIDDLE_NAME = {Middle name},
		LAST_NAME = {Last name},
		GENDER = Gender,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH = {Year of birth},
		JOB_TITLE = Functional_title,
		HOWLONG = Howlong,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE = Priorexperience,
		ADDRESS = Address,
		CITY_NAME = Cityname,
		POBOX = Pobox,
		POST_CODE = Postalcode,
		NATIONALITY = Nationality,
		SKYPE = Skype,
		AIM = Aim,
		Yahoo,
		MSN = Msn,
		CITY_REGION = Cityregion,
		JOB_TITLE = {Job title},
		ID = Uniqueid,
		USERNAME = User_id,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectcolumns
Selectcolumns derive(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT = coalesce(EMAIL,concat(FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,GENDER,YEAR_OF_BIRTH))) ~> Participantcomibanation
ExistingDim derive(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT = coalesce(EMAIL,concat(FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,GENDER,toString(YEAR_OF_BIRTH)))) ~> Prticipantcombination
Prticipantcombination, LatestParticipantID join(ExistingDim@PARTICIPANT_ID == LatestParticipantID@PARTICIPANT_ID
	&& Prticipantcombination@UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT == LatestParticipantID@UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT
	&& ExistingDim@VERSION_NO == LatestParticipantID@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoiningDIMtable
JoiningDIMtable select(mapColumn(
		EXIST_PARTICIPANT_ID = ExistingDim@PARTICIPANT_ID,
		EXIST_VERSION_NO = ExistingDim@VERSION_NO,
		EXIST_EMAIL = EMAIL,
		EXIST_LAST_NAME = LAST_NAME,
		EXIST_MIDDLE_NAME = MIDDLE_NAME,
		EXIST_FIRST_NAME = FIRST_NAME,
		EXIST_GENDER = GENDER,
		EXIST_YEAR_OF_BIRTH = YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
		EXIST_NATIONALITY = NATIONALITY,
		EXIST_JOB_TITLE = JOB_TITLE,
		EXIST_ADDRESS = ADDRESS,
		EXIST_ID = ID,
		EXIST_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT = Prticipantcombination@UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT,
		EXIST_USERNAME = USERNAME,
		EXIST_HOWLONG = HOWLONG,
		EXIST_PRIOR_EXPERIENCE = PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
		EXIST_SALUTATION = SALUTATION,
		EXIST_CITY_NAME = CITY_NAME,
		EXIST_POBOX = POBOX,
		EXIST_POST_CODE = POST_CODE,
		EXIST_SKYPE = SKYPE,
		EXIST_AIM = AIM,
		EXIST_MSN = MSN,
		EXIST_CITY_REGION = CITY_REGION,
		EXIST_Yahoo = Yahoo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExistingCol
SelectExistingCol derive(RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,EXIST_EMAIL,
EXIST_LAST_NAME,
EXIST_MIDDLE_NAME,
EXIST_FIRST_NAME,
EXIST_GENDER,
EXIST_YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
EXIST_NATIONALITY,
EXIST_JOB_TITLE,
EXIST_ADDRESS,
EXIST_ID,
EXIST_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT,
EXIST_USERNAME,
EXIST_HOWLONG,
EXIST_PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
EXIST_SALUTATION,
EXIST_CITY_NAME,
EXIST_POBOX,
EXIST_POST_CODE,
EXIST_SKYPE,
EXIST_AIM,
EXIST_MSN,
EXIST_CITY_REGION,
EXIST_Yahoo)) ~> ExistingRecordHash
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PARTICIPANT_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		EMAIL,
		LAST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		GENDER,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
		NATIONALITY,
		JOB_TITLE,
		ADDRESS,
		ID,
		USERNAME,
		HOWLONG,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
		SALUTATION,
		CITY_NAME,
		POBOX,
		POST_CODE,
		SKYPE,
		AIM,
		Yahoo,
		MSN,
		CITY_REGION,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InsertDimParticipant
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		PARTICIPANT_ID = EXIST_PARTICIPANT_ID,
		VERSION_NO,
		EMAIL,
		LAST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		GENDER,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
		NATIONALITY,
		JOB_TITLE,
		ADDRESS,
		ID,
		USERNAME,
		HOWLONG,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
		SALUTATION,
		CITY_NAME,
		POBOX,
		POST_CODE,
		SKYPE,
		AIM,
		Yahoo,
		MSN,
		CITY_REGION,
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpdateDimParticipant
